supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-10 (in mm), (1) 52 x 59, (A) 2 col., col. i: 4 lines, right margin, col. ii: 8 lines, left margin, (B) 8 lines, no margins, (2) 74 x 39, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (3) 90 x 60, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (4) 44 x 55, (A) 4 lines, top right margins, (B) 5 lines, top margin, (5) 106 x 24, (A) 6 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (6) 109 x 42, (A) 9 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (7) 98 x 25, (A) 8 lines, bottom margin, (B) 8 lines, bottom margin, (8) 98 x 47, (A) 3 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (9) 101 x 45, (A) 9 lines, left top margins,(B) 6 lines, top margin, (10) 131 x 35, (A) 10 lines, top left margins, (B) blank
